Changelog¶

version 0.4¶

  • Wrote the library specification and revised the library module. Behavior should be better defined now in edge cases.
  • Added multi-tag switch to tag and untag commands.
  • Added clean command
  • Added socket/fuse commands. Framework has been laid to interact directly with virtual mounted FUSE libraries.
  • Added mknode command
